name: HighsCutPool
brief:
Cutting plane storage and separation for MIP solver

**HighsCutSet:**
Container for cuts to add to LP relaxation:
- cutindices: Indices into cut pool
- ARstart_/ARindex_/ARvalue_: CSR storage for cut coefficients
- lower_/upper_: Cut bounds (typically -inf, rhs)

**HighsCutPool:**
Manages all generated cutting planes:
- matrix_: HighsDynamicRowMatrix storing all cuts
- rhs_[]: Right-hand sides
- ages_[]: Cut age (incremented when not binding, reset when used)
- hashToCutMap: Duplicate detection via row hashing

**Cut Lifecycle:**
- addCut(): Add new cut with duplicate detection and clique extraction
- separate(): Select violated cuts for LP (scoring + density limits)
- performAging(): Increment ages, remove old cuts (age > agelim_)
- lpCutRemoved(): Called when cut leaves LP

**Cut Propagation:**
- propagationDomains: Registered domains for cut-based bound tightening
- propRows: Active propagation rows
